# Edit Subscription Name

In some cases, you might need to rename your subscription so you can find it easily in your list of subscriptions.&#x20;

The Marketplace Platform lets you rename your subscriptions in the **Active** and **Updating** states. Subscriptions can be renamed using the **Rename** option on the subscription details page.&#x20;

{% hint style="info" %}
Changing the subscription name only affects its display in the Client Portal. The updated subscription name will not be reflected in the vendor's system.
{% endhint %}

## Editing a subscription's name

To rename a subscription:

1. Navigate to the **Subscriptions** page.
2. Select the subscription you want to rename.
3. On the subscription details page, select the down arrow <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">and select **Rename**.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/Rename1 (1).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Rename option on the details page</p></figcaption></figure>

4. In the **Rename** dialog, enter the new name and select **Save**.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (1065).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Rename a subscription</p></figcaption></figure>

The subscription is renamed, and the new name is visible across all pages that feature the subscription within the platform.&#x20;
